captions.text:
We?re going to teach our dogs to shake and
how you start shake is basically is to get

your dog in the sit position. All you want
to do is get their hand or their paw I should

say, into your hand so they start realizing
that's what you want. So get her into the

sit. Good girl and I just want to pick up
the hand and tell her good girl, give her

a treat. The next progression to this would
be to actually start helping her out by tapping

her and you want to see the foot kind of lift.
I want to tap her a little bit, see if she

lifts that foot up. Once she?s doing it on
a regular basis almost offering it to me,

I am going to give her a little help. Good
girl. Get your mark word in there, which is

your good girl. Yeah we got some slobber going.
Now I can add the word shake on to it. So

now I can put my hand signal which is the
flat palm and ask her to shake. Good girl,

and we got a little spook going on over here.
I want to ask her, shake, give her her hand

signal. Good girl, give her her treat and
I can let her hand go. Shake one more time,

now we got the other hand and let it go. You
can mess around with that and two different

hands, give me the other one. Good girl, and
that?s how you teach them to shake.

title: Dog Tricks : Paw Shake Dog Trick

 He does this even if I give him a treat.  He just seems to get really

comments.author: Angela O'Neil

comments.text:
if that's the case DON'T get mad or discipline the dog. Remember this dog 
in the video most likely had some training before the video. If your dog 
has a problem with you touching his paws the easiest and most calming way 
to get over that phase is by massage. A simple way is by massaging his paws 
while you and him relax together. Rubbing up and down his legs so he learns 
to realize your not going to hurt him but relax him. Once you can touch his 
paws with no hassle try this trick again:)
comments.author: Autumn Emerald
